phrases: My beloved Vieira Sensei, it is been 10 fast years since I promised to certainly return to Europe...
But I am still unable to leaving here at all.
Do you want to be a Conductor, huh?
Then you should quickly just study abroad.
To be so scared of planes that you cannot get into one...
Wherever you are, it will just be the same!
If that is the case, all the more
it seems that in Japan there is an amazing person as well
Nodame wants to be a kindergarten teacher.
There are more things I can still do here
They said that Stresemann is coming to our school!
Such a good thing, just when I am about to submit my request to move to the Conducting Division...
You said you want to form a new student Oke?
Using the students I chose, MY Oke.
The Members of Stresemann's Specially Organized Orchestra
Wonderful, to be in an Oke with Stresemann!
What is this strange standard of selection!
Are not they all underachievers only?
What is that at the last line?
Mahler's Symphony no 8 conducted by Stresemann
Was not I so astounded when I first listened to it?
Wondering what kind of person is this to have conducted Mahler so beautifully...
that he is such a dirty old man...
Even so, I want to learn from him...
Even if I wanted to go abroad, I cannot go anyway...
This is the only chance I can truly learn from a great master in Japan!
Why cannot I be the pianist?
Oh...but a pianist cannot join an Orchestra...
However being my mascot, you can stay near me all the time.
But Nodame wants to play the piano!!
So you are going to change divisions, Chiaki-kun?
But it is already autumn in your fourth year.
Actually I have been considering this for a long time
finally I could make up my mind.
Today I intend to submit this.
So you have been wanting to be a Conductor since a long time ago...
Though for me, it is been fun to watch your progress in piano
If you change divisions you cannot play the piano with Nodame anymore
We will not be friends in the same Division anymore
I do not get what you mean.
I do not permit your transfer to the Conductor Division
Is there such a reason like that?
You said that you are Vieira's pupil, did not you?
I do not like him either!
Is it acceptable for a Professor to reject a student who wants to learn from him just based on a personal feeling?
Here I am the THE Rule!
I will show I can change even a Ginza high-class Club into a low-level come-and-touch pub.
That being the case, Senpai, completely give up moving to the Conductor Division!!
Trying to attract my Chiaki-Sama, eh?
You are on top on my murder list!
bad luck on you, bad luck on you, bad luck on you, bad luck on you...
You are all, for the periodical performance next month,
I, Stresemann, have organized this Special Orchestra...
namely you are all S-Oke Members.
From today we are all a family.
time and effort are very important.
Today, if we want to talk about music, let us spend a fun time now!
He probably does not know exactly what it means
Seems it is been a while since he was in Japan last
Well, why not, in any case not everybody is here yet...
Oi, what song shall we play for School Festival?
Rather than that, Mine, is it OK for you not to appear in S-Oke?
I am going to live with just Rock!!
Your repeat-exam for violin is next week, is not it?
You are just playing electric violin all the time, will you be alright?
What if you have to stay the same year?
Just after I asked that Chiaki to be the pianist to accompany you
Is it true that he left you?
because he is unable to catch up with my sharp feeling!
Is not there someone artistic, who has more technique, is flexible,
gentle, and can match my sense of feeling?
You took my rice ball, did not you?
Arghhh, just one more bite to reach the filling!
Can I ask you to play the piano for my violin exam?
Wow, you are selected not only for A-Oke, but also for S-Oke
As expected from a queen of timpani
Who would want to participate, with that Mascot Girl!
That was Spring when I was 18..
after coming here to Tokyo with love for music in my heart...
I want to go home to Yamagata!
I have been just looking at him from afar...
Do you know Beethoven's Violin Sonata?
Someone asked me to play it but I do not know it well...
If I cannot change Divisions, I will transfer to a better Academy...
This is a very scary thing!
Tonight let us enjoy ourselves, just the two of us!
of course with Chiaki Senpai's home cooking...
Unable to go abroad, unable to change Divisions...
What should I do from now on?
Yes, we were in sync even in our mistakes!
There is SOUL in your piano!
Up to now, it is the pianists who have been incapable!
I will sure pass the exam!!!
Why is it cheaper to buy 2 fishes??
Tonight let us enjoy ourselves, just the two of us!
No, give me two fishes, please.
Here is the soup, the fried rice's soup.
Nodame can always eat here for free!
Well, what can I do, she is your destiny-girl!
No mistake he is a rocker from Violin Division's Rock Band.
So he asked Nodame to play the piano for him.
She will go anywhere as long as she is fed
Yuki-chan, do you have...or do not have... a boyfriend, a boyfriend, a boyfriend, do you have a boyfriend?
No, I do not have one!
He really knows gokon very well!
It is been a while to have a quiet night like this...
Omiya, omiya, omiya, omiya for Senpai!
(omiya=omiyage, something you bring back as a gift)
What do you want this late, Garbage Female!?
Just when I came to say sorry for treating you too harshly last time...
No, I did not mean it is you...
Come on, be strong, my exam is next week!
I will help you get him!
I might stay in the same year because of this!
I will not let a broken heart put me down!
Why can such an ugly girl be the heroine?
I already heard it many times.
When Shinichi was down I also listened to you, did not I?
The one who is the most shining among them...
How am I supposed to understand such a vague description?
Ah, he just took a sip of his tea
How do I have a bad taste?
Well, because he is wearing geeky pants, ..
Why do you like such a guy??
She is Tagaya Saiko, beautiful and intelligent, the Madonna of the Vocal Division!
Having such a good girlfriend, the chance that Chiaki will turn to you is zero!
So that is that, give it up and let us practice, okay?
What is the point of practicing?
In any case I am going to die anyway...
Just broken heart, you cannot possibly die!
It was in my post box today.
If you do not pass this letter on to 100 people within 2 days, you are going to die!
He must be an idiot, so backward!
Please help me write this letter!
Rather than doing that, do not you recall doing anything that might cause other people to bear a grudge on you?
Could it be because I ate Maki-chan's lunch box?
Or could it be because I stole some food in the campus' dining hall?
Or could it be because in the nearby fish shop I...
This is really a classic-type harrassment.
it is amazing that it is in such a short range!
I do not know who is doing this, but you deserve it, you had better not eaten out of other people's lunch box anymore.
When it comes to food, her character changes.
Be still, take off your wig!
It is real hair, real hair!
You are Masumi-chan the timpani player!
Why did you play tricks on me?
Do you mean to disturb my practice?
Do not you come near Chiaki-Sama!
By just looking at him from afar, he is the Apollo...no...the Sun, that gives me the courage and hope to live.
He is that kind of person...
This being the case, Noda Megumi!
This being the case...what do you mean?
OK I got it, I accept your challenge!
Nono, do not you two think you are having the wrong fighting opponent?
You two, your enemy is Tagaya Saiko, right?
OK, I will fight with timpani!
OK, I will fight with piano!!
No, there is no such duel!
If you want to duel, do it in such a way that is easier to understand!
Hmm...for example...the first one succeeding to have a promise for a date with Chiaki is the winner...
Today you are going to accompany me until morning again, are you?
If you need a listening ear, ask your boyfriend.
You have a boyfriend, do not you?
That ham-looking guy from the Conductor Division.
Come on, he is not my boyfriend...
Moreover, at this time he is in Germany.
I also want to learn conducting.
For the time being what I can do is just to keep studying it by myself.
However hard you study, if you cannot study abroad, it is useless... did not you say so?
It is not that I cannot study abroad, it is just I cannot get on a plane!
As long as I can go abroad...
Shall we get back together again?
We are similar, are not we?
We are both at this time...
Lai, lai, lai, lai, lai Dank..dank..dank..danke scheen!
Shall we go somewhere on the next off-day?
As a sign of my gratitude, I want to treat you...
Oh, are these for the duel inviting Chiaki?
I will die, I will die, I will die, I will die...
Could it be that you have never talked with Chiaki?
Please, invite him for my behalf.
I will not stoop down to ask him a favor!
It is been a long time.
You are Violin Division's Miki Kiyora-san...
If I am not mistaken you were studying abroad...
Yes, I returned in summer...from Vienna
A nice place...moreover I had the chance to participate in their Student Orchestra.
I learned a lot from it.
Chiaki-kun should also go there even once...
Ah, now I am the Concert Mistress in A-Oke...
will not you come and see us?
Yes, I have never seen it.
What is happened with you, Masumi-chan...
Wearing such an outfit, it is not a real performance anyway.
Leave me alone...anything bad to you?
I am risking my life on this practice...
All of you, do not you dare to goof up, OK!
Let us begin with No 9's 1st movement
Okuyama Masumi will convey his strong feeling for you using his timpani.
a most stupid idiot a most stupid idiot idiot idiot idiot
Had I listened while closing my eyes it would have been great..
Again I am just watching from afar...
Senpai, which restaurant will be good for our date?
Date is two loving couple going together somewhere...
In other words, the two of us will go to have a meal together
But you promised me last time...
I am not in such a mood.
There is only the piano for you, is not it?
If you cannot play the piano well your existence has no worth...
Sorry, I did not mean to say my true feeling...
Hey, will not you be my girlfriend?
OK, OK, I know, I know...
so let us practice, I ask you... practice!
I want to eat Senpai's home-cooking!
Could it be because he has some pulse for you?
A guy would not have cooked for a girl he dislikes!
It may still be worth trying
Chiaki is a guy, too, after all, use all your woman's weapons!
And do not you have any sexy dress?
Marilyn Monroe was like this, was not she?
Cannot you do even a little bit make-ups at your age?
the cheeks and lips should be pink and fresh...
This way Senpai will be attracted, will not he?
I have wanted to see you!
Do you feel falling in love?
What are you doing making such a noise in the middle of the night?
No, I am just helping them to make you love them, and this is the result...
Who can fall in love with a female like her?
he is a man, is not he!
You are the ones being mean!
And what is that earlier music playing?
You seriously think you are good at violin?
I once won third place in the National Junior Competition!
Because of that people call you Whizz Kid etc and you got a mistaken conception.
Let me borrow your violin for a moment.
Just a little is enough, OK?
Speaking of a junior competition, I also once won First Prize in Vienna.
I would not mind teaching you a little
I do not need your instruction!
You two, if you do not know the piece, why do not you listen to CD!
Heee...I feel good... it is totally different from the one he played with me
What you two play is Rainy Season (he is being sarcastic)
You are not listening to the sound of the piano!
Playing just to express your own feeling!
Do not pay too much attention to techniques!
That is all, four in all!
He is looking down on me..
That is why I hate classical music!
Be it rhythm, be it pitch...the piece must be accurate according to technique, technique!
However hard one tries to express the music according to oneself, by only one mistake he will be regarded as intermediate level
On top of that, a joker like Chiaki will suddenly appear, extinguishing my enthusiam
He is from the Piano Division, but he is excellent at violin too.
Do not dismiss what I said like that!
I must be playing badly, I must have no talent!
Mine-kun...but Chiaki-Senpai did not say even a word that Mine-kun plays badly.
He said the way you express music is interesting...
He said you are not good at Ensemble yet he said you are good at Solo...
Only a person like him...will suddenly catch something...
This is a very pleasant piece, Spring
the image is of a flower field...
It is rude to Beethoven to have such a childish image of a flower field
So what image should it be?
the joy and lightning of the shining youth... perhaps...
I am not in a situation to take care of other people, am I?
It is me, it is me, the secondly famous in Conductor Division, Ookouchi Mamoru
Pretty bad for me, although Stresemann came here, he is only busy with S-Oke
While Hayakawa-kun has recived guidance from Sebastiano Vieira, you know!
Errr, your trousers, which brand are they?
S-O S-Oke, S-O S-OKe, Viola, Horn, Kontrabass!
By the way, who are you?
I am Kawano from Monthly Magazine Classic Life's
Future Conductors; having lecture from Sebastiano Vieira's.
Mr. Hayakawa, a student from Japan
What the heck are you doing?
Today is the first piano accompaniment, is not it!
Right...why do you always wear such thin clothes?
I want to fight using sexiness...
Anyway I already brought her here.
Wrapping her around like a caterpillar...what am I supposed to do?
Be grateful that I brought her here!
She said if the Prince kisses her, she will recover
I will play the piano for you.
I am... thinking of going home to Yamagata..
Although Masumi-chan got kicked out of A-Oke, you still have S-Oke!
Just because you are rejected by a guy you are really going to quit?
So your love for music is just this much.
It is because he took a private lesson in Germany so he missed the exam last time
Why is my turn after his?
Hmph, we will definitely beat him!
We have never even once practised together!
At least I am better than that piano!
It is good, is not it...to be rewarded even without making any effort... can even talk big as well!
I will tell you, since 3 years old I have been learning piano and violin constantly
Especially violin, before I entered the Academy I practiced it from morning till night everyday
I practiced it so very hard, I could have vomitted blood
In fact I also want to learn other instruments
but my piano was still no good
that is why I entered Piano Division in the Academy
Well, thanks to learning it seriously I managed to be on top
now perhaps I am a little bit neglectful
Oi, halfway it turned into a boasting story!
In the end, what is it you wanted to say?
to become a Conductor is my dream
That is why although I am studying various things
I have not been rewarded by anything either
Today do not be bothered by techniques and details
However, listen carefully to Ore-Sama's (my) sound
Other than that, do it as you would like to
The joy and lightning of shining youth...
As soon as I told him to do as he pleases, he became himself
As usual he is so sloppy
but I will show I can adjust to him...
Wow, amazing...he came when I want him to come...
Chiaki is directing it... I can set my mind at peace...
Although he had to contend with deafness, Beethoven never gave up music
and composed cheerful and happy pieces
after the hard and harsh Winter passes...
finally the warm Spring will come...
I wonder if Spring will also come to me...
The duel is not over yet!
I got a job offer from a game company
Yaa...as I thought, it is good that I am into computer music
Ah, your exam is OK, is not it?
Let us play in our Band!!
The song to play in School Festival?
I am going to disband our Band
I am going to live with Classic!
I am going to try it once more...
Good, as long as you do not dance again...
Talking about S-Oke, is it true that Stresemann denied your request to change divisions?
I was thinking that if you transfer to the Conductor Division it will take longer time to your graduation
This way, after your graduation you will go to Europe, right?
You have talent and connection, there is no reason for you not to study abroad, is there?
Just when I was looking forward to playing in the Orchestra Chiaki conducted...
You are Nodame's friend, are not you?
Let Chiaki Senpai move to Conductor Division!
Request to Change Divisions Please let me enter Conductor Division Chiaki Shinichi
If Nodame-chan kisses me, I will approve Chiaki's Division change.
You did not lose at all, after all!
Kissing is no big deal in the west.
That is why I said you win.
With a kiss, change Divisions No kiss, no change of Divisions
No more being close next door?
(rude way of calling an old man)
Did not he say that as soon as everybody's here the practice will begin?
And you are all stinking of alcohol!
As I thought, it is strange!
somehow in this Oke, everybody seems not very good at music...
Ahhh...the room is filled with stinking breaths!
What is he doing, that Jiijii!!
I cannot stand it anymore, sorry but I am going home!
Is Mascot Girl going to conduct?
Milch is taken by a sudden illness
